actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Energy Production and Regulation.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources; Senate Subcommittee on Energy Production and Regulation. Hearings held. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 104-248.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Energy Production and Regulation

official_title: A bill to repeal section 210 of the Public Utility Regulatory Policies Act of 1978.
subjects: Cogeneration of electric power and heat

summary.text: Electric Utility Ratepayer Act - Repeals a specified section of the Public Utility Regulatory Policies Act of 1978 requiring public utilities to offer to sell electricity to, and purchase electricity from, qualifying cogeneration and small power production facilities.

titles.title: A bill to repeal section 210 of the Public Utility Regulatory Policies Act of 1978.
